ambiguities.source_text: Work out the total car sales per month / per car dealership
ambiguities.ref: df['Total Car Sales'] = df['Red Cars'] + df['Silver Cars'] + df['Black Cars'] + df['Blue Cars']

ambiguities.source_text: Make a date that will work in Tableau Desktop (from When Sold Year and When Sold Month)
ambiguities.ref:
df['When Sold Year'].astype(str) + '-' + 
        df['When Sold Month'].astype(str).str.zfill(2) + '-01'
